Articles.Content: I don't know if it's a bug, but Duna's SSTV are nonexistant to me, i checked to make sure i was on the right spot according to http://www.kerbalmaps.com/ and it's obviously the place (the hill is whiter then anything around) i went twice, once in 0.21 and the other in 0.22 and i'm parked on top of the hill as we speak, i clearly ear the music and game sound, but no SSTV, it's disapointing... were the SSTVs removed from that place?? did i missed something obvious because i'm stupid??
I can't help you, but thanks for the link to those maps. I haven't seen them before.
I believe that because of the terrain redo in 0.21 that the sound is below the current ground.
The SSTV is from the Chatterer mod!!
The sound is underground. Clip the camera under the pyramid and move it around slowly and you'll find it.

The SSTV is from the Chatterer mod!!

Entirely wrong, try not to spread false information.

Entirely wrong, try not to spread false information.

Sorry, but there was a thread confusing the mod with this. Don't immediately jump to conclusions and accuse me.

Edited October 28, 2013 by Javster
Yes, you're right, it's underground! thanks (hope they'll fix all that "easter-egg beeing underground" thing soon... also, easter eggs should give at least a bit of science...)
